#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
long divisors(int num){
    long sum=0;
    for(int i=1;i*i<num;i++){
        if(num%i==0){
            sum=sum+i+num/i;
        }
    }
    float t=sqrt(num);
    if(t==(int)(t)){
        sum+=t;
    }
    sum-=num;
    return sum;
}
using namespace std;
int main(void){
    int t,n,a,b;
    cin>>t;
    while(t){
        cin>>n;
        a=divisors(n);
        b=divisors(a);
        if(n==b)
            cout<<"Yes, amicable with "<<a<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"No"<<endl;
        t--;
    }
    return 0;
}
